original_text: The people of those cities have no power. They are afraid and they are confused. They are like plants in a field, that cannot live for a long time. They are like fresh green grass, or grass that grows on the roof of a house. When a hot wind blows on them, it burns them and they die. The people of those cities have no power.
korean_text: 그러므로 거기에 거주하는 백성의 힘이 약하여 두려워하며 놀랐나니 그들은 들의 채소와 푸른 풀과 지붕의 잡초와 자라기 전에 시든 곡초 같이 되었느니라

sentences.original_text: The people of those cities have no power
They are like plants in a field
that cannot live for a long time
They are like fresh green grass
or grass that grows on the roof of a house
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 집 지붕에 자라는 풀과 같다

sentences.original_text: When a hot wind blows on them
it burns them and they die
The people of those cities have no power
